## I see dead people

### Question 01

Where do the remains of R. A Fisher lie?

```{r}
print("St Peter’s Cathedral, Adelaide, Adelaide City, South Australia, Australia")
```

### Question 02

What deceased statistician said "All models are wrong but some are useful"?

```{r}
print("George Box")
```

### Question 03

What deceased person is credited with first using the term "regression" to describe the relationship between two variables?

```{r}
print("Francis Galton")
```

### Question 04

What well-known company hired the (now deceased), pseudonymous “Student” (a.k.a. William Sealy Gosset) in 1899?

```{r}
print("Guinness")
```

### Question 05

What famous female historical figure is credited with innovative use of information graphics, like the polar area diagram?

```{r}
print("Florence Nightingale")
```

## The R-things

### Question 06

What is the name of the town in England North West starts with R and has a twinning city/town?

```{r}
print("Rochdale")
```

### Question 07

What is the name of one of the Economics Nobel laureates who surname starts with R?

```{r}
print("Paul Romer")
```

### Question 08

On the TV show "Buffy, the Vampire Slayer", which run between 1996 and 2003, what is the name of  Buffy Summers' teacher and mentor?

```{r}
print("Rupert Giles")
```

### Question 09

What is the name of the captain of the boat which picked up Victor in Mary Shelley famous book "The Modern Prometheus", also know as "Frankenstein".

```{r}
print("Captain Robert Walton")
```

### Question 10

What is the name of the English inventor best known for designing a drop box to improve the capability of weaving looms and son of John Kay?

```{r}
print("Robert Kay")
```

## R-related questions

### Question 11

Which one of these data sets is not in the R `datasets` package:

- `ldeaths` (Monthly Deaths from Lung Diseases in the UK)
- `USArrests` (Violent Crime Rates by US State)
- `gapminder` (Excerpt of the Gapminder data on life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population by country)
- `HairEyeColor` (Hair and Eye Color of Statistics Students)

### Question 17

Match the following codes with their result.

6. `11 %% 2`

C.  `r 1:10%%2`
D.  `r 1:10 * 2 %% 2`
